reviewText: just a brief note to say i am glad to finally own what i would call a classic. everytime i would see this movie on tv i said i want to own it now i do so thank you

Now today alot of black people treat white people badly. But you really cant blame the black race from doing so. Im just hoping that someday black people will let by gones be by gones. And that we all get along better than we do. After all it wasn't us white people of today that treated the blacks badly. It was our for fathers. So all I got to say is that I hope the good book is right on it. And those for fathers of ours are paying for it now in death. If all that nonsense never happened. Then I believe we would all get along with alot of love like it was suppose to be. And its not like that. But at least one can dream about it.
